name: STARSEEKER (Text Demo)
description:
A small text based adventure game dedicated to my dream game.  Made in Python! 
I don't plan to expand this text version of this game, but I've got big plans for this game. 

Mega thanks to  Sushirolled for designing the STARRYKNIGHT! 

- Originally for a school assignment about Object-oriented programs.
